verses.text: \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levitical|strong="H3881"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*—\w indeed|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*—\w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w Although|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* brothers, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*’ \w share|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, whether \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bull|strong="H7794"\w* \w or|strong="H7794"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*: \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H2220"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* jowls, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w stomach|strong="H6896"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* are \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w grain|strong="H1715"\w*, \w new|strong="H8492"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w first|strong="H7225"\w* wool sheared \w from|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* chosen Levi \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* moves \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w town|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* residence \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* comes \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* earnestness \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* choose,

\w then|strong="H5975"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H8334"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* fellow \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H4465"\w* eat \w equal|strong="H2506"\w* \w portions|strong="H2506"\w*, \w even|strong="H5921"\w* though \w he|strong="H5921"\w* has \w received|strong="H5921"\w* money \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sale|strong="H4465"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* father’s estate. Sorcery Forbidden (Acts 8:9–25)

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* enter \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w imitate|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w detestable|strong="H8441"\w* ways \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w among|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* sacrifices \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* fire,\f + \fr 18:10 \ft Literally makes his son or his daughter pass through the fire\f* \w practices|strong="H6049"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* conjury, \w interprets|strong="H5172"\w* \w omens|strong="H7080"\w*, \w practices|strong="H6049"\w* \w sorcery|strong="H3784"\w*,

\w casts|strong="H2266"\w* \w spells|strong="H2267"\w*, \w consults|strong="H7592"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w medium|strong="H7592"\w* \w or|strong="H1875"\w* \w spiritist|strong="H3049"\w*, \w or|strong="H1875"\w* \w inquires|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H1875"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w detestable|strong="H8441"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w detestable|strong="H8441"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w driving|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5973"\w* must \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w blameless|strong="H8549"\w* \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H8085"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w dispossess|strong="H3423"\w*, \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* conjurers \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w permitted|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*. A Prophet Like Moses (Acts 3:11–26)

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w me|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* brothers. \w You|strong="H3644"\w* must \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7130"\w*.\f + \fr 18:15 \ft Cited in Acts 3:22\f*

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H6963"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w* \f + \fr 18:16 \ft That is, Mount Sinai, or possibly a mountain in the range containing Mount Sinai\f* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* fire \w anymore|strong="H5750"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*!”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* brothers. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w hold|strong="H1875"\w* \w accountable|strong="H1875"\w* anyone \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w prophet|strong="H1696"\w* \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 18:19 \ft See Acts 3:23.\f*

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H1931"\w* \w any|strong="H1697"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* dares \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w My|strong="H1696"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* other gods, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* ask \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, “\w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w recognize|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*?”

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w presumptuously|strong="H2087"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w afraid|strong="H1481"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*.
